line_1: Till the dropsy had swell'd him as big as a ton.
line_2: Gave the doctors the hearing — but still wou'd drink on,

line_1: For I'm told to waste time is entirely the ton,
line_2: Nor must I omit how the mornings glide on,

line_2: While, fir'd by thee with spirit not her own,
